thread.title: BRIEF-Simpson Manufacturing Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.54

title: BRIEF-Simpson Manufacturing Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.54
text:
April 30, 2018 / 7:55 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Simpson Manufacturing Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.54 Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Simpson Manufacturing Co Inc:
* 2018 Q1 NET SALES OF $244.8 MILLION INCREASED 11% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* REITERATING FINANCIAL TARGETS AND ASSUMPTIONS UNDER COMPANY’S “2020 PLAN” * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54
* SIMPSON MANUFACTURING - BELIEVES, DUE TO UNCERTAINTY RELATED TO STEEL TARIFFS, MARKET PRICE FOR STEEL TO LIKELY CONTINUE TO INCREASE DURING Q2
* SIMPSON MANUFACTURING - CO BELIEVES, DUE TO UNCERTAINTY RELATED TO STEEL TARIFFS, MARKET PRICE FOR STEEL TO LIKELY CONTINUE TO INCREASE DURING Q2 Source text:( bit.ly/2I1TpmW ) Further company coverage:
